info.title: Assessment - Service
info.description: Assessment Service of EkStep Learning Platform provides resources to create, manage and search Assessment Items and itemsets. AssessmentItem API provides resources to work with questions in the platform and itemset API provides resources to create and manage itemsets.

tags.name: AssessmentItem
tags.description: Everything related to CRUD Operations of the AssessmentItem

tags.name: itemset
tags.description: Everything related to CRUD Operations of the itemset

post.description: This API searches and retrieves an assessmentitem/question based on the filter and relation types specified in the request body

400.description: Error While searching for an AssessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While searching for an AssessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This API creates an assessmentItem/question of type MCQ(multiple choice questions) or FTB(fill in the blanks) or MTF(match the following) based on the request body

400.description: Error While creating assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While Creating assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

get.description: This API is used to fetch an assessmentItem from the _EkStep Platform_.This endpoint returns the entire assessmentItem Object with default fields.

400.description: Error While fetching the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While fetching the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

delete.description: This API is used to delete an assessmentItem from the EkStep Platform

400.description: Error While deleting the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While deleting the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

patch.description: This API is used to update an assessmentItem based on the request body provided from the _EkStep Platform_. This endpoint return node_Id on updation

400.description: Error While Updating the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While Updating the assessmentItem! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This API is used to list all assessmentItem from the _EkStep Platform_.This endpoint returns the assessmentItems  with default fields.

400.description: Error While fetching the assessmentItems! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While fetching the assessmentItems! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

post.description: This API is used to create an itemset into the _EkStep Platform_ based on the request body provided. This endpoint returns the response Object with SetId created

400.description: Error While creating Item! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While creating Item! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

get.description: This API is used to fetch an itemset from Item Repository of EkStep Platform. This endpoint returns the entire itemset Object with default fields.

400.description: Error While fetching the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While fetching the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

delete.description: This API is used to delete an Item set from the itemset repository of EkStep Platform.

400.description: Error While deleting the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While deleting the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

patch.description: This API is used to update an existing itemset in the Item repository  based on the request body provided from the _EkStep Platform_. This endpoint returns responseObject with SetId on updation

400.description: Error While Updating the Item Set! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While Updating the Item Set! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This API is used to search and retrieve all itemsets from the Item repository based on the given search creteria in the request body

400.description: Error While searching for an itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While searching for an itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This API is used to list and retrieve all itemsets from the Item repository based on the given search creteria in the request body

400.description: Error While fetching all itemset lists! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While fetching all itemset lists! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

get.description: This API is used to generate an itemset from itemset Repository of EkStep Platform. This endpoint returns the entire itemset Object with default fields.

400.description: Error While generating the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'.

500.description: Error While generating the itemset! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'.

allOf.description: select any one request body to create/update AssessmentItem

usedFor.description: where the itemset is used For

usedIn.description: where the assessment is used used

usedFor.description: where the itemset is used For
